definition: the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
really/truly/indeed/real/true/genuine
real/true/honest/really/solid/fruit/seed/definitely
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Experiment results show that those approaches have good real -time performance and vivid effect.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，該算法達到了較好的實時性和真實感。

sentences.english: Photorealistic and sparkly screen-printed graphics at front.
sentences.chinese: 閃閃發光的真實感和絲網印刷在前面的圖形。

sentences.english: This image needs to be photorealistic and automatically generated.
sentences.chinese: 此圖片需要真實感和自動生成。

sentences.english: The slumped physicality of this Christ, however, is almost miraculous.
sentences.chinese: 但基督癱軟的身體則具有一種奇蹟般的真實感。

sentences.english: Realistic appearance, the use of more realistic , non-polluting, more environmentally.
sentences.chinese: 外形逼真，使用更具真實感，無污染，更環保。

sentences.english: Conversely, mathematical structures have an eerily real feel to them.
sentences.chinese: 反過來說，數學結構也具有令人發毛的真實感。

sentences.english: Per-pixel lighting is a major advance to photo-realistic images.
sentences.chinese: 象素光照是在向照片級真實感圖像發展中的一大步。

sentences.english: That's the way it has to be, everything proper , Keepin it always true.
sentences.chinese: 人生就是這樣，總是有困難，讓生活更有真實感。

sentences.english: Miriam text to overcome the non-store direct marketers of non-realistic.
sentences.chinese: 克服無店鋪文儀直銷商的不真實感。

sentences.english: This allows for photo realistic images and renderings.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就可以得到真實感的圖像及渲染效果。

sentences.english: To accomplish non-photorealistic pictures, researchers have studied and found many effective methods.
sentences.chinese: 爲了得到非真實感圖片，人們研究了各種方法。

sentences.english: The core and the base of the virtual walkthroughs is the real graphic scene's producing and rendering.
sentences.chinese: 其核心和基礎是真實感圖形的實時生成和繪製。

sentences.english: Besides, the authors make a suggestion on how the automatic plotting of terrain perspective graphy with high level of reality can ber…
sentences.chinese: 此外，還對生成高度真實感地形透視圖提出了建議。

sentences.english: Realistic appearance, the use of more realistic , non-polluting, more environmentally friendly.
sentences.chinese: 外形逼真，使用更具真實感，無污染，更環保。

definition: to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
lit. four ounces can move a thousand catties (idiom)/fig. to achieve much with little effort
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
innovative/ingenious/originality/ingenuity
(music) to change key/modulation/(of an employee) to be transferred to another post
lit. dragons and snakes mingle (idiom)/fig. a mix of good people and scumbags
to force someone to do something
unity
hard power (i.e. military and economic power)
political correctness/politically correct
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
magnificent army with thousands of men and horses (idiom); impressive display of manpower/all the King's horses and all the King's men
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
unripe/tart/not fully proficient/somewhat shaky
